message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still feel that $10,000 would be a fair price for this product. Can we meet at this price point?
